00020 class ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder: public ORVDigitizerDecoder
00021 {
00022   public:
00023     ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder();
00024     virtual ~ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder() {}
00025     enum EKatrinFLTWaveformConsts {kBufHeadLen = 9, 
00026                                   kWaveformLength = 1024, //this is no longer valid, use GetWaveformLen() -tb-
00027                                                           //maybe rename to kWaveformPageLength ... ?
00028                                   kNumFLTChannels = 22};
00029     size_t fWaveformLength;
00030

00034     virtual bool SetDataRecord(UInt_t* record);

00038     virtual inline UInt_t GetSubSec();

00051     virtual size_t CopyWaveformData(UShort_t* waveform, size_t len);
00052 
00053     /* Satisfying ORVDigitizerDecoder interface. */
00054     virtual double GetSamplingFrequency() {return .01;}
00055     virtual UShort_t GetBitResolution() {return 14;} 
00056     virtual size_t GetNumberOfEvents() {return 1;}
00057     virtual ULong64_t GetEventTime(size_t /*event*/); 
00058     virtual UInt_t GetEventEnergy(size_t /*event*/) {return GetEnergy();}

00061       { return GetWaveformLen(); }

00063                                           size_t waveformPoint )
00064       { return (UInt_t) GetWaveformDataPointer()[waveformPoint]; }

00076  // -tb-
00080 inline size_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetWaveformLen() 
00081 {
00082   return fWaveformLength;
00083 } 
00084 
00085 inline UInt_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetSec()
00086 {
00087   return (fDataRecord[2]);
00088 }
00089  
00090 inline UInt_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetSubSec()
00091 {
00092   return (fDataRecord[3]);
00093 }
00094 
00095 inline UInt_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetChannelMap()
00096 {
00097   return (fDataRecord[4] & 0x3FFFFF);
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline UShort_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetEventID()
00101 {
00102   return ( fDataRecord[5] & 0x3FF );
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline UShort_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetPageNumber()
00106 {
00107   return ( fDataRecord[5] & 0x1FF0000 ) >> 16;
00108 }
00109 
00110 inline UInt_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetEnergy()
00111 {
00112   return (fDataRecord[6]);
00113 }
00114 
00115 inline UInt_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetResetSec()
00116 {
00117   return (fDataRecord[7]);
00118 }
00119 
00120 inline UInt_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetResetSubSec()
00121 {
00122   return (fDataRecord[8]);
00123 }
00124 
00125 inline UShort_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetChannel()
00126 {
00127   return ( fDataRecord[4] & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24;
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline UInt_t* ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetWaveformDataPointer()
00131 {
00132   return (fDataRecord + kBufHeadLen);
00133 }
00134 
00135 inline ULong64_t ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder::GetEventTime( size_t )
00136 {
00137   return ((ULong64_t)GetSec() << 32 ) + (ULong64_t)GetSubSec();
00138 }
